title: Shining Like You
overview: Lucia has always been an excellent student, obedient to her parents. One day, she decides to fulfill her dream in the hope of succeeding in the entertainment industry and fakes a letter of admission to the Southern University of the Arts, deceiving her parents. An absolute introvert and seemingly unremarkable Lucia begins a difficult path to self-improvement and character education. Her sincerity and kindliness resonate with the two "gods" of the university, the handsome Fangyan and Da She.
